TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicyWrapper extends System.Web.HttpCachePolicyBase

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicyWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicyBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class. This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class while also exposing the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicyBase> type. The <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicyBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
